ontologyFramework.OFProcedureManagment

Class OFProcedureSynchronisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ontologyFramework.OFProcedureManagment.OFProcedureSynchronisation

  • public class OFProcedureSynchronisation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains, for a given procedure individual name, a list of names related to other ontological individuals that represent procedures. In particular, the list represents the name of ontological procedures that have to finish its computation before to run this particular procedure.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Buoncomapgni Luca

    • Constructor Detail

      • OFProcedureSynchronisation

        public OFProcedureSynchronisation(java.lang.String individualName)
        Create a new synchronization object relate to an procedure individual.
        Parameters:
        individualName - of the ontological procedure for this instance.

      • OFProcedureSynchronisation

        public OFProcedureSynchronisation(java.lang.String individualName,
                          java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual> synchInd)
        Create a new synchronization object relate to a procedure individual. Also it initializes it with some synchronization relations with respect to other procedure. Practically this method will call this.addSynchronisation( i) for all i into the parameter synchInd. If this class has been already created for the procedure defined by individualName, than this method does not create a new instance and update the synchronization individuals to the already existing one, avoiding to duplicate data.
        Parameters:
        individualName - of the ontological procedure for this instance.
        synchInd - set of individual to synchronize

    • Method Detail

      • addSynchronisation

        public void addSynchronisation(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual ind)
        Add an individual to the synchronization list. This means that the procedure with the individual name defined by getSyncName() before to run has to wait until also the procedure refereed to the individual given as parameter ends it work.
        Parameters:
        ind - procedure individual to be synchronized with.

      • addSynchronisation

        public void addSynchronisation(java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual> ind)
        It calls addSynchronisation(OWLNamedIndividual) for all component inside the set given as input parameter.
        Parameters:
        ind - set of procedure individual to be synchronized with.

      • getSynchIndividuals

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSynchIndividuals()
        Returns:
        the actual list of synchronization individuals

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getAllInstances

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,OFProcedureSynchronisation> getAllInstances()
        static method that returns all instance of this class created by the framework. Those are collected in an HashMap with keys equal to the ontological name of the procedure.
        Returns:
        all created instance of this class.

      • getOFProcedureSynchronisation

        public static OFProcedureSynchronisation getOFProcedureSynchronisation(java.lang.String referenceName)
        It looks inside the returning value of getAllInstances() and return an istance of this class in accord with its name inside the map. Basically it just return; OFProcedureSynchronisation.getAllInstances.get( referenceName)
        Parameters:
        referenceName - the individual name of the procedure for which refer to its synchronization list.
        Returns:
        an instance of this class relate to the procedure defined by an individual with name: referenceName

      • removeSynchronisation

        public static void removeSynchronisation(java.lang.String synchName)
        It remove the instance with individual name equal to the input parameter from the map that collect all the active instance of this class. Practically, it just call: OFProcedureSynchronisation.getAllInstances.remove( synchName)
        Parameters:
        synchName - individualName for which the instance of this class must be removed.

      • removeSynchronisation

        public static void removeSynchronisation(OFProcedureSynchronisation synchObj)
        It remove the instance given as input parameter from the map that collect all the active instance of this class. Practically, it just call: OFProcedureSynchronisation.getAllInstances.remove( synchObj.getSyncName())
        Parameters:
        synchObj -
